casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Thomas WILKERSON. No. 170A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 25, 2007. Andrew M. Gregson, Assistant District Attorney, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Serve Proposed Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 29th day of October 2007 to serve his/her proposed record upon *893the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of September 2007."
